mapper.insert: insert into card(company,user, status, create_time) values(#{company}, #{user}, #{status}, #{create_time})
insert into approval(company,user, status, create_time, start_time, end_time, reason,type) values(#{company}, #{user}, #{status}, #{create_time}, #{start_time}, #{end_time}, #{reason},#{type})
mapper.select: select count(id) from card where user = #{0} and date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{1}

select u.display_name as displayName, d.name as deptName, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(c.create_time) as cardTime from user u LEFT JOIN dept d on d.id = u.dept LEFT JOIN card c on c.user = u.id where u.company = #{0} and (c.create_time is null or date_format(c.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{1}) GROUP BY u.id ORDER BY c.create_time desc, u.id asc limit #{2}, #{3}

select a.id, u.display_name as displayName, d.name as deptName, a.type as type, a.reason as reason, a.status aStatus, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_time) as appTime from approval a LEFT JOIN user u on u.id = a.user LEFT JOIN dept d on d.id = u.dept where u.company = #{0} and u.status != 92 and a.status != 92 order by a.create_time desc limit #{1}, #{2}
SELECT max(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(end_time)) FROM approval where type = #{type} and user = #{user} and status = #{status}
